Articles.Content:
This is a capital ship based on the Wing Commander IV's Frigate. All stock parts. Thanks to the new NASA parts, it made launching this frigate possible. With this Frigate, you could dock Mun landers and such to it then send the ship to the Mun.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

There are three separate components that make up the Frigate

The Bow (front component) - http://www./view/yq669sk7mkk1916/Caernavon_bow.craft

The Center (central component) - http://www./view/o2n3s8ut28d8kj5/Caernavon_center.craft

The Stern (engine component) - http://www./view/r7bplbmt1c8py4c/Caernavon_stern.craft

I've yet to test the actual ship itself, but I plan to send things up to the Frigate such as the Kerbal Attachment System to keep it from wobbling as I steer it...

Update on the Frigate

Just added a couple of strut connectors from the Kerbal Attachment System to keep the ship's components from wobbling. I sent a "Utility" craft to provide some connectors and fuel.

Nice view from the lander can I placed on the engine component.

Getting out after docking.

The Kerbonaut comes out to place the connectors onto the ship

Some of the Kerbonauts are ready to get on board the KCS Kaernavon

I also decided to see if the Kaernavon could make a flyby to the Mun and it did.

Took forever, but managed to get the Kaernavon back to Kerbin

The Frigate has returned!

With that flyby, the next phase will be to load a couple of landers or small Mun bases to the Kaernavon and drop them off at the Mun.
